clip_assessment.verbatim_quote: Insurability became an issue with affordability... we've seen a massive shift in our market.
clip_assessment.guest_voice: Direct, no-fluff communicator who states market realities plainly without drama — speaks in clear declarative statements about what IS happening, not what might happen.
clip_assessment.why_this_stops_scrolls: It names the invisible deal-killer that agents are experiencing but not talking about — the thing that's tanking transactions after inspections and making buyers walk.

HOOK.text: Insurance is killing more deals than bad inspections right now.
HOOK.production_note: Text on screen: 'INSURANCE > INSPECTIONS' with a red X over a house icon. Fast cut energy.

SETUP.text: If you've had a buyer walk after everything looked good, this is probably why. Jeff Biebuyck moves luxury properties in Calabasas and Hidden Hills — top 1% nationwide — and he's watching it happen in real time.
SETUP.production_note: B-roll of luxury homes, then cut to Jeff speaking. Keep it tight.

INSIGHT.text: Here's what he told me: 'Insurability became an issue with affordability. We've seen a massive shift in our market.' Translation? Buyers are pre-approved. Inspection's clean. Then they get the insurance quote — if they can even GET insurance — and the numbers don't work anymore. In fire-risk zones, premiums doubled or tripled. In flood zones, policies disappeared entirely. Suddenly a $2 million home costs $25K a year just to insure. That's a $2,000 monthly payment your buyer didn't budget for.
INSIGHT.production_note: Show insurance quote examples on screen. Highlight the monthly cost difference. Use visual math: $2M home → $25K insurance → $2K/month.

REFRAME.text: Which means you can't just be a real estate agent anymore. You need to know insurance like you know comps. You need carriers who'll actually write policies. You need to set expectations before the offer, not after.
REFRAME.production_note: Cut back to host or Jeff. Serious tone. This is the 'wake up' moment.

CTA.text: So here's your homework: Call three insurance brokers this week. Ask what's actually insurable in your market right now. Because if you're not having this conversation before escrow, your competition is.
CTA.production_note: Text on screen: 'CALL 3 BROKERS THIS WEEK' — make it feel like a checklist item they can screenshot.

caption: The hidden deal-killer no one's talking about (and how top agents are adapting)
